description: Zafran is a socially responsible food company founded in 2011, focusing on creating high-quality, healthy snacks with minimal ingredients. The initiative emphasizes inclusivity by employing individuals facing barriers to employment, including those with disabilities and from vulnerable backgrounds. Zafran is committed to sustainability, sourcing ingredients responsibly, and promoting a holistic approach to nutrition. The company aims to inspire a shift towards healthier eating habits while fostering community and collaboration within the food industry.
name: Zafran
